summary: Defense Science and Technology: Adopting Best Practices Can Improve Innovation Investments and Management DOD plans to invest $12.5 billion on innovative technology in fiscal year 2017. We compared DOD's approach with how leading technology companies like Amazon and Dow manage their science and technology investments. title: Defense Science and Technology: Adopting Best Practices Can Improve Innovation Investments and Management
